KSLU_LRC_RESCOMP_TYPE.NAME: Fixed Number
KSLU_LRC_RESCOMP_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: This records a range of number of credits that can be awarded for this course.

KSLU_LRC_RESCOMP_TYPE.NAME: Variable Number
KSLU_LRC_RESCOMP_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: This records a single fixed number of credits that are awarded if the student passes the course.

KSLU_LRC_RESCOMP_TYPE.NAME: Final Grade
KSLU_LRC_RESCOMP_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: This records that a final grade is a result for this course
